Angder.name: Angder
description: Angder is chaotic, violent, and has a love of combat. He often goes <c=boldPink>missing</c> for extended periods in order to steal from and damage the enemy ship.

AggressiveSiphon.name: SHIELD DIVERTER
AggressiveSiphon.description: Gives you 2 <c=status>POWER SIPHON</c> at the start of each combat. <c=status>POWER SIPHON</c> does not decay below 2.

ChainAxe.name: CHAINSAW AXE
ChainAxe.description: For every 3 cards played in one turn that are not from Angder or his lootstash, gain 1 rampage. <c=downside>Capped at three activations per turn.</c>

Biggerbullets.name: BIGGER SHELLS
Biggerbullets.description: Destroying Midrow objects deals 2 damage to the enemy ship. UNUSED

HairTrigger.name: HAIRTRIGGER
HairTrigger.description: At the start of each combat, add at least one <c=card>"Slight nudge"</c> card to your discard pile. <c=boldPink>the number of cards generated scales with a larger deck, capping at 4 with 25 cards</c>. <c=downside>Not recommended for drone users.</c>

ShipsManifest.name: SHIPS MANIFEST
ShipsManifest.description: At the start of combat, gain 3 <c=status>PLANNED HEIST</c>. <c=status>PLANNED HEIST</c> grants an extra card.

description.None: On draw, attack <c=boldPink>{{damage}}</c> then draw a card. Exhaust.
description.A: On draw, attack <c=boldPink>{{damage2}}</c> then draw a card. Exhaust.
description.B: On draw, attack <c=boldPink>{{damage3}}</c> then draw 2 cards. Exhaust.

description.None: Select a card in hand, it gains Remote control.
description.A: Select two cards in hand, they gain Remote control.
description.B: Every card in your hand gains Remote control.

description.None: Deal damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as damage.
description.A: Deal piercing damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as pierce damage.
description.B: Deal damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as damage.

description.None: Deal damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as damage.
description.A: Deal piercing damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as pierce damage.
description.B: Deal damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as damage.

Remotecontrol.name: Remote Control
Remotecontrol.description: This card can be used while its owner is missing.

Rampage.name: RAMPAGE
Rampage.description: If <c=3A4999>Angder</c> is missing at start of your turn: Deals <c=boldPink>{0}</c> hull damage to the enemy, <c=downside>then decreases by 2.</c>

Theft.name: PLANNED HEIST
Theft.description: If <c=3A4999>Angder</c> is missing at start of your turn: add a 0 cost card into your hand from Angder's haul, <c=downside>then decreases by 1.</c>

FuelSiphon.name: FUEL SIPHON
FuelSiphon.description: If <c=3A4999>Angder</c> is missing at start of your turn: Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>, <c=downside>then decreases by 1.</c>

FuelDump.name: FUEL DUMP
FuelDump.description: If <c=3A4999>Angder</c> is missing at end of your turn: Applies <c=status>ENGINE STALL</c> to the enemy ship, <c=downside>then decreases by 1.</c>

Disrupt.name: POWER SIPHON
Disrupt.description: If <c=3A4999>Angder</c> is missing at end of your turn: gain <c=boldPink>{0}</c> <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>, <c=downside>then decreases by 1. If over 5, decreases by 2 instead.</c>

description.Positive: Instantly move the enemy {{number}} to the right.
description.Negative: Instantly move the enemy {{number}} to the left.

description.Right: Fire <c=boldPink>{{Long}}</c> shots, dealing <c=boldPink>{{truedamage}}</c> damage each. Each shot drifts further to the Right
description.Left: Fire <c=boldPink>{{Long}}</c> shots, dealing <c=boldPink>{{truedamage}}</c> damage each. Each shot drifts further to the Left
description.Unknown: Fire <c=boldPink>{{Long}}</c> shots, dealing <c=boldPink>{{truedamage}}</c> damage each. Each shot drifts further in a random, but consistant, direction.

description.Damage: Deal damage equal to your current hull. <c=downside>You then take damage equal to their remaining Hull value.</c> this attack does not require you to be facing the enemy, and cannot be dodged.
description.Piercing: Deal damage equal to your current hull, bypassing their shields. <c=downside>You then take piercing damage equal to their remaining Hull value.</c> this attack does not require you to be facing the enemy, and cannot be dodged.

description.Damage: This action deals a set amount of damage per shot, it cannot be modified by status effects or artifacts.
